          <title>
            <string language="en">A Musical Accent Activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Musikalische Akzent-Aktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une Activité Musicale d'Accent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Atividade Musical Do Acento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'Attività Musicale Di Accento</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Una Actividad Musical Del Acento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An activity to help music students practice using accents.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aktivität, zum der Musikkursteilnehmer zu 
helfen Akzente, zu verwenden zu üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité pour aider la musique des étudiants
pour pratiquer utiliser des accents.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade para ajudar a estudantes da música

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività per aiutare gli allievi di musica a

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα για να βοηθήσει την πρακτική 
σπουδαστών μουσικής που χρησιμοποιεί τις εμφάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad para ayudar a estudiantes de la 
música a practicar el usar de acentos.</string>
          </description>
